info.name: Flickr visited photo indicator
info.description:
If you've visited a photo before, you get a pink (in the flickr R colour) indicator around the preview.
Made to work in conjunction with my other style, "Dark grey Flickr -- Photoshop style", on request.
Enjoy! Cheers!
info.additionalInfo: If you prefer a matching blue outline instead, change the colour to the one in comments.
